Juegaso una experiencia mucho mejor a su primera parte y muy desafiante a los amantes de los puzzles (Chupala Glados)

The only puzzle game so far that made me emotional.

Filled up with a really good story, an interesting development of the characters through the entire game, and funny at the same time thanks to a lot of jokes here and there.

The puzzles have been crafted with care and detail, and the co-op mode is no different.

An easy 10/10.

Great game! Truly a Masterpiece with it's comedy and great storytelling.

Bah juste un des meilleurs jeux auquel j'ai jamais joué, pour dire le seul vrai défaut que je lui trouve est sa durée de vie (environ 8h avec le mode coop). De très bonnes énigmes même si elles ne sont pas très complexes, un gameplay excellent, des personnages très bien écrits et un humour qui fait mouche. Nan franchement, c'est toujours une valeure sûre même 9 ans après sa sortie il n'a prit aucune ride
Muy bueno, nunca pierda la magia

I am tired of having a high IQ...
Seriously. I am so sick of this it's not even funny. People seem to think this is some kind of gift, but it's not. They think it automatically gives you the answer to any question. I would give this shit away in a second if it meant I could have one moment of normalcy. What really sucks is that you cant talk to people about it. If you do, they either get afraid to talk to you or they think you are bragging about it. I had hoped Mensa would help me with this, but it hasn't.

So you want to know what his 'gift' has done for me? It has made me an outsider all of my life. My parents found out about my IQ in junior high but hid it from me because 'they didn't think it was fair to the other kids' meaning my 5 brothers and sister. As a result, I didn't find out about it until I was in my fifties, just a few years ago.

I have spent my entire life wondering why I was different from other people; why I didn't think like them or enjoy the same things or why I was unable to express myself to them. Because of this I was constantly called stupid by other students, by family,, and by adults all around me.. This 'gift' has caused me to have a long string of low paying jobs that I have never fit into. It has cost me two marriages and two sons who are alienated from me. There is not one single time in my life when I truly felt like I belonged somewhere, with the exception of the first time I flew a plane. Even now that I know about it I have trouble with dealing with people.

I have had it. People think this is so great but they just do not know how it can be a curse as well. You want his? Tell me how I can give it to you and its yours.

Pretty good game this was just some r/mensa cringe post I found.

Раз уж стим просит, то чего бы не рассказать, почему я выбрал эту игру в премию "Любимое дитя".

Portal 2 считают лучшей игрой от VALVE, и это действительно так.
Игра во всех аспектах хорошая, качественная. По сравнению, как мне показалось с первой частью, которая была довольно скучна - эта была на голову выше предыдущей. 
Интересные головоломки, сюжет, завязка и персонажи - это все ждет вас в Portal 2. Даже когда вы пройдете сюжетную кампанию, и вам станет грустно, вы всегда можете позвать друга (если он у вас конечно есть, ы) в кооперативный режим, где вы вместе будете ломать головы. Ну и еще есть моды, да, много разных интересных модов. 
Оптимизация - добротная. На пожилом ноутбуке 2012 годов идет на высоких, я доволен. 

Рекомендую эту игру тем, кому она будет интересна. Будут скидки - берите смело, не пожалеете. Я её прошел и навсегда полюбил жанр подобных головоломок. Всем советую.

 10 "Я ВАМ НЕ ДУРАК!" из 10. 

[spoiler] З.Ы Единственная игра, в которой я сам честным путем выполнил все ачивки, хи-хи-хи. [/spoiler]

Singleplayer: golden, mind-racking, truly fun experience. It's probably been said thousands of time before, but this is really the cream of the crop

Co-op: How fast can you piss off your partner before you eject each other off cliffs and laser beam them to death

I speedrun this game, so there may be a little bit of bias here, but Portal 2 still remains one of my favorite games of all time. It's got great story, great characters, great gameplay, it's all just such an amazing experience. If you haven't played this game yet, I highly suggest it.
